participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and caring, with a passion for physical therapy and running.
participant_1.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i've three dogs. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: responsible and family-oriented, with a love for sports and a stable career.
participant_2.background: i am a male. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.
